title.rendered: How to Successfully Recruit AWS Developers

content.rendered:
[vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”80″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″ css=”.vc_custom_1486487468849{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_column_text]Is your company looking for a service that will allow you to store vast amounts of data, while offering cheap computing power that helps your business to scale and grow? Well, with Amazon Web Services (AWS) emerging as one of the industry’s leading cloud solutions, it’s clear your business will not only need to invest in this service but secure the experienced professionals who know how to optimize your use of this solution. Now’s the time to uncover practical solutions to successfully recruit AWS Developers. [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space empty_h=”1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_font=”font-148806″ text_color=”color-prif” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_speed=”500″ animation_delay=”100″]2019: The Year of The Cloud [/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]A 2017 Forrester report, “Predictions 2019: Cloud Computing,” predicted that cloud computing would accelerate the rate of a company’s digital transformation. Now another Forrester study proves that and also has revealed that 2019 will be the year cloud giants like Google, IBM, Microsoft Azure, and AWS, expand their services on a large scale never seen before. To remain competitive, your Tech business will need to prioritize your cloud initiatives.

When you learn how to recruit AWS Developers successfully, you can start virtualizing your infrastructure which will require less on-site maintenance, improves efficiency, and lowers app development time. You’ll need to onboard experienced AWS Developers so that when you prioritize your cloud initiatives, your company can position itself to compete with the industry’s top contenders. You’ll also reduce enterprise cost, development time, and reduce the risk of losing data.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_font=”font-148806″ text_color=”color-prif” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_speed=”500″ animation_delay=”100″]Strategies to Recruit & Retain AWS Developers[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]It’s clear that your Tech business will need to find the experienced professionals who can help you reap the various benefits of investing and prioritizing your cloud-based efforts. Here are a few practical steps you can integrate to recruit AWS Developers effectively:[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”90″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][uncode_list icon=”fa fa-bar-graph” icon_color=”color-210407″]

  • Offer Competitive Salaries. Now that your company understands the importance of securing an AWS Developer, you’ll need to offer competitive salaries to stand out from the other businesses and attract these professionals. Resources like our 2019 Salary Guide can provide exclusive insights into the average salary range for AWS Developers, helping you secure the professionals you need by offering a competitive salary.
  • Craft An Inclusive Culture. Once you’ve found the AWS Developers that can help reduce cost and development time, your company will need to learn how to retain these professionals. Many experts have listed toxic work environments, and employee mistreatment as one of the growing threats companies like yours will face. Crafting an inclusive culture can create a work environment where your employees feel heard, included, and supported.
  • Avoid Any Bias. Hiring biases can prevent diversity, decrease productivity, and create a stall in revenue generation, so when you are looking to recruit AWS Developers, you’ll want to avoid any biases. Integrating standardized interviews will put everyone on the same playing field, while naturally allowing their experiences and talents to unfold. Learning to prevent your hiring biases is crucial to finding these professionals.
  • Invest In Your Developers. Again, attracting these professionals won’t be enough. Besides crafting an inclusive and diverse work culture, your business can also invest in your employees. Investing in your Developers’ careers will increase retention rates, along with crafting a positive culture. You’ll need to show candidates you value your talent and are willing to invest your time, money, and resources toward their professional growth.

[/uncode_list][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]These practical strategies can help your business recruit AWS Developers and retain them to reduce both your business costs, app development time, and reduce the risk of losing data. If your company currently doesn’t have the time or resources to secure these professionals, contact Mondo today. Our dedicated Tech recruiters can help you find the AWS Developers that can enhance your cloud-driven initiatives. [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”0″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_font=”font-148806″ text_color=”color-prif” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_speed=”500″ animation_delay=”100″][/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space empty_h=”0″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
